name: Home
body:
TacoSpigot
===========
TacoSpigot is a even higher performance fork of PaperSpigot.

## Features
- Optimizes hoppers by 80-95
  - Adds an option to disable InventoryMoveItemEvent
- Optimizes armor stands by 90%+
  - Disables gravity for armor stands (you must set "armor-stand.optimize-movement" to true)
  - Avoiding looking up entities when moving
- XRay optimization
  - Reduces redundant checking for blocks
- Optimize getting blocks
  - Helps with entities and redstone
  - Doesn't even show up in the developer's samplings anymore
- Optimize setting blocks
  - Helps with redstone
  - Is now at '0%' in samplings
- Slightly faster event execution

## Downloading
TacoSpigot has pre-built binaries built using [Paperclip](https://github.com/PaperSpigot/Paperclip)
You can download them here: https://ci.techcable.net/job/TacoSpigot/
The latest build is usually the most stable.

## Building
- Clone [TacoSpigot](https://github.com/TacoSpigot/TacoSpigot)
- Run './build.sh'

## Developers
- Techcable

## Sponsors
[![YourKit Logo](https://www.yourkit.com/images/yklogo.png)](https://www.yourkit.com/java/profiler/index.jsp)

YourKit supports TacoSpigot and other open source projects, with the best java profiler available. They are instrumental in making sure that TacoSpigot performs well!
